body.name: Neutrogena Pore Refining Toner with Witch Hazel, Alpha Hydroxy Acid & Beta Hydroxy Acid, Oil-Free & Hypoallergenic Facial Pore Cleansing Toner, 8.5 fl. oz
body.stockDetail: Only 13 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 9 hrs 9 mins.
features: 8.5-fluid ounce bottle of Neutrogena Pore Refining Toner to help reduce the appearance of pores and gently refine skin, leaving it clearer, smoother and more even-toned
This cleansing toner is designed to sweep away dead surface skin and smooth rough, uneven patches so that skin is left feeling soft, smooth and refreshed
Dermatologist-tested formula of this facial cleansing toner is made with witch hazel, alpha & beta hydroxy acids to help deliver visible results by reducing the look of pores
Our gentle face toner cleanses deep into pores without causing irritation or over-drying and is designed for all skin types
Non-comedogenic, oil-free, and hypoallergenic, our pore refining toner features a unique formula that won't clog pores yet provides visible results and clearer looking skin
body.description: Help refine your skin and make it clearer, smoother, and more even-toned with Neutrogena Pore Refining Toner. Designed for all skin types, the gentle formula of this facial cleansing toner sweeps away dead surface skin, smooths rough, uneven patches, and helps reduce the appearance of pores. The dermatologist-tested formula contains witch hazel, alpha and beta hydroxy acids to help deliver visible results and leave skin soft, smooth, and refreshed without over-drying. This refining toner is non-comedogenic, oil-free, and hypoallergenic, so it won't clog pores or cause irritation.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does refine my pores.
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this for pore refining which it does do over time. Is a little drying but I use a moisturizer under my foundation. Is perfect for my oily T-zone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My one and only toner!
reviews.reviewText: Can't find this in stores anymore, so I purchase it from Amazon. Works very well, and face feels clean afterwards.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works Very Well! No smell. No foam. Simple. Go for it.
reviews.reviewText: Continuous and consistent use of this product works very well. Only giving it 4 stars because I'm not done with it yet. Like all ingredients you put INSIDE your body (in a perfect world) care about your skin, considering just WHAT ingredients you apply TO your skin. There are TONS of beauty supplies out there, but if you're not familiar with what's in it (or can't pronounce it without googling it) chances are it's probably not good for you..For generations, I've found Neutrogena to be one of the more reliable beauty products out there.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We’ve been using this toner for a couple years now and we love it. We put it on after cleansing, then follow up with Olay Regenerist regenerating serum (unscented). People have been complimenting our skin for many months now. We’re pretty sure they are both wo4king.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It works for me really well.
reviews.reviewText: When a product like this works there is nothing to dislike. It said it cleans out your pores and it does. 😀

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite toner
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this toner for years and cannot understand why it’s so hard to find in stores. It leaves my skin smooth and clean without irritating my sensitive skin.
